name: Zoophobia The Visual Novel
description:
I dont have any experience with game making and stuff but I made this, a Visual Novel about Zoophobia. This is only the first public demo, and a lot of things will probably change in the final version, might even need an actual writer for it. Anyways I think there isnt much introductions to make since this is a fangame, just have fun.

Oh and one important thing, this game has a discord where you can report bugs or give me feedback, and also if you wish to work in the project the server is the best way to get in contact. The link is https://discord.gg/zfZjFYSCKT
